|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cch), wcel(c1, chba)), wceq(co(c0, cph, cfv(cspn, csn(c1))), co(c0, chj, cfv(cspn, csn(c1)))))

comment: The subspace sum of a closed subspace and a one-dimensional subspace equals their join. (Contributed by NM, 4-Jun-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
